LandingPage.heroTitle: Make AI your <advantage>competitive advantage</advantage> – in just 2 days.
LandingPage.heroSubtitle: We help you move from AI hype to real, measurable value – with concrete solutions, hands-on training, and results you can feel.
LandingPage.statsROI: x ROI in the first year
LandingPage.whyHardTitle: Why is AI so hard to implement?
LandingPage.whyHardItem1Desc: AI demos are impressive, but few turn into usable solutions in your context.
LandingPage.whyHardItem2Title: Too much theory, too little action
LandingPage.whyHardItem2Desc: "AI strategy" and "digital transformation" sound good – but rarely create concrete results.
LandingPage.whyHardItem3Desc: Traditional AI projects require constant assistance – leaving you without internal strength.
LandingPage.isThisForYouSubtitle: Are you ready to use AI – but don't know where to start? This workshop is designed for companies that:
LandingPage.isThisForYouItem1: Are curious about AI, but lack direction
LandingPage.isThisForYouItem2: Have tried AI demos without anchoring them
LandingPage.isThisForYouItem3: Want concrete solutions – not just strategies
LandingPage.isThisForYouItem4: Want to equip employees with knowledge, skills, and confidence
LandingPage.ourMethodTitle: Our method: Practical AI in 48 hours
LandingPage.ourMethodDay1Item4: Building AI competencies in your team
LandingPage.ourMethodDay2Item1: Final development and integration of solutions
LandingPage.ourMethodDay2Item4: Action plan for the next 90 days
LandingPage.resultsItem1Desc: From manual analyses to automated risk assessments with images, video, and manuals.
LandingPage.resultsItem2Desc: AI generates service reports, reduces manual tasks, and frees up technicians.
LandingPage.resultsItem3Desc: AI analyzes turnover time, identifies rarely used parts, and improves forecasting.
LandingPage.resultsItem4Desc: Automated comparison of technical data from PDFs – from hours to minutes.
LandingPage.resultsItem5Desc: AI compares reports/images and builds a database for smarter case handling.

LandingPage.teamMember2Ach2: Expert in pedagogical communication of technology

LandingPage.ctaFinalSubtitle: Let's find out if we're the right match. We help identify your potential and next steps.
LandingPage.contactDescription: We help companies streamline workflows, reduce wasted time, and strengthen decision-making power – in just 2 days.
